The ShareX website is a suite of websites addressing Deep Renovation of multifamily residential buildings in Eastern Europe. These include a general purpose public website (sunshineplatform.eu) and the SUNShINE multi stakeholder platform and these are subject to change.

Services offered by the ShareX website include the website content and tools, the SUNShINE multi stakeholder platform (hereafter referred as “SUNShINE Platform”), and other features offered in connection with the ShareX website.

The SUNShINE Platform is managed by the Building and Energy Conservation Bureau (Ēku Saglabāšanas un Energotaupības Birojs, briedrība) incorporated and operating under Latvian law with Reg.
